results.title: Transfer Talk: Ronaldo urges Al Nassr to sign De Bruyne - ESPN
results.content: Transfer Talk: Ronaldo urges Al Nassr to sign De Bruyne - ESPN Transfer Talk: Ronaldo urges Al Nassr to sign De Bruyne Transfer Talk: Ronaldo urges Al Nassr to sign De Bruyne TOP STORY: Ronaldo wants Al Nassr to sign Man City's De Bruyne Al Nassr striker Cristiano Ronaldo is "urging" his side to make an attempt to sign Manchester City midfielder Kevin De Bruyne, according to Mundo Deportivo. Talks are believed to be set to take place in the coming weeks between the 21-year-old's representatives and the Blaugrana, who could be open to moving him on when the transfer window opens in January.

results.title: Real Madrid Legend Cristiano Ronaldo Makes Retirement Statements - Forbes
results.content: Real Madrid legend Cristiano Ronaldo made various statements related to retirement and his post-playing plans to Portuguese outlet Now. Smashing the world transfer record in 2009 when he left Manchester United for the Spanish giants, Los Blancos' all-time top scorer then departed the Bernabeu in 2018 a five-time winner of both the Ballon d'Or and Champions League. I'm very happy to play in the Arab league and I want to continue," Ronaldo said to Now. Failing to make much of an impact at the most recent Euros won by Spain as his country limped out of the quarterfinals to France, Ronaldo insisted that he'll not reveal his plans as per retiring from international football, and therefore the Portugal fold, to those in his circle ahead of making an announcement.

results.title: Football gossip: Ronaldo, De Bruyne, Alonso, Torres, Lewandowski, Salah, Van Dijk - BBC.com
results.content: Football gossip: Ronaldo, De Bruyne, Alonso, Torres, Lewandowski, Salah, Van Dijk - BBC Sport BBC Sport Cristiano Ronaldo wants Manchester City's Kevin de Bruyne at Al-Nassr, Manchester Utd interested in Bayer Leverkusen boss Xabi Alonso and Robert Lewandowski has option to extend Barcelona deal. Al-Nassr and Portugal forward Cristiano Ronaldo, 39, is urging the Saudi Arabian club to sign Belgium midfielder Kevin de Bruyne when the 33-year-old's contract with Manchester City runs out next summer. Saudi Pro League club Al-Ahli want to sign Egypt forward Mohamed Salah, 32, and his 33-year-old Liverpool team-mate Virgil van Dijk when their contracts with the Reds run out at the end of the season. (Sport - in Spanish), external (Sport - in Spanish), external

results.title: An bukaci Juventus ta biya Ronaldo £8.3m - BBC.com
results.content: An bukaci Juventus ta biya Ronaldo £8.3m Asalin hoton, Getty Images Wata kotu a Italiya ta umarci Juventus ta biya Cristiano Ronaldo albashin £8.3m. Ronaldo mai shekara 39, ya amince a jingine albashinsa a lokacin da aka samu tsaikon cutar korona a kakar 2020-21. Dan kasar Portugal ya ce yana bin sama da £17m da ya kamata a biya shi.  Yadda gwamnatin jihar Katsina ta rarraba wa jami'an tsaro motocin yaƙi 'Ba mu so azumi ya wuce ba saboda za mu daina cin shinkafa' Duniya na gab da shaida bayyanar taurari masu tsananin haske na 'nova' Hankalin duniya ya karkata kan martanin da Isra'ila za ta mayar wa Iran Wanda aka fi karantawa © 2024 BBC. Labarai masu alaka Babban Labari KAI TSAYE, Sojojin Najeriya sun tarwatsa yankunan ƴan Boko Haram da ISWAP a Borno Abin da muka sani game da ƴaƴan shugaban Hamas da Isra'ila ta kashe a Gaza Labarai na musamman Darajar naira: Me ke faruwa da Adam A. Zango? Abubuwan da ke faruwa a Najeriya da sauran sassan duniya Wane yanayi ake ciki a Iran bayan kai wa Isra'ila hari?  Ronaldo ya yi kaka uku a Italiya a Juventus tsakanin 2018 zuwa 2021, wanda ya taimaka ta dauki kofin Serie A biyu.

results.title: Cristiano Ronaldo breaks silence as he hits back at critics - Sporting News
results.content: Cristiano Ronaldo breaks silence as he hits back at critics | Sporting News Ronaldo Ronaldo Ronaldo Cristiano Ronaldo breaks silence as he hits back at critics Cristiano Ronaldo has once again silenced his critics. What Cristiano Ronaldo said? Despite doubts about his decision to leave Manchester United for Saudi Arabia, Ronaldo insists his focus has always been on success, not just the paycheck. MORE: All the latest soccer action | Cristiano Ronaldo news Ronaldo has already tasted victory in the Arab Champions Cup, scoring twice in the final against Al-Hilal in 2023. For Ronaldo, the mission remains the same: prove the doubters wrong and cement his legacy as one of football’s greatest, with the aim of 1000 career goals.
